title: NYSE parent invests $2B in Polymarket at $9B valuation
contentSnippet: NYSE parent company, Intercontinental Exchange, has invested $2 billion in the crypto prediction market Polymarket at a $9 billion valuation.

title: Opera and Decrypt Team Up to ‘Bring the Next Billion Users’ to Web3
contentSnippet: The partnership will bring Decrypt’s news coverage to Opera’s hundreds of millions of users through its Opera News platform.

title: Bitcoin Treasury KindlyMD to Issue $250M in Convertible Debt With Nasdaq-Listed Antalpha
contentSnippet: The company, the result of a merger earlier this year with David Bailey's Nakamoto Holdings, holds about $726 million in its Bitcoin treasury.

title: North Korean Hackers Have Stolen Over $2 Billion This Year: Elliptic
contentSnippet: North Korea’s crypto theft spree has already hit a record $2 billion in 2025, nearly triple last year’s total.

title: India slams ‘unbacked crypto’ amid RBI’s new digital currency plans
contentSnippet: India doesn’t “encourage or discourage” crypto, it “only taxes it,” Minister Piyush Goyal said, while unveiling a new RBI-backed digital currency project.

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Is Already Its Most Profitable, Surpassing Older ETFs
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs will be a "clear leader" over traditional funds as IBIT nears the $100B milestone, analysts told Decrypt.

title: Tether Plans to Propose Candidates for Soccer Club Juventus Board Seat: Reuters
contentSnippet: The stablecoin giant will submit its list at the club's annual shareholder meeting in November

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.

title: Bitcoin Rally is Fun, but Don't Overlook RWAs: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 7, 2025

title: Streamex shares soar 20% on gold-backed stablecoin pre-sale launch
contentSnippet: Streamex shares surged over 20% as the company announced a pre-sale for GLDY, a gold-backed stablecoin offering 4% yield and targeting institutional investors.

title: New York Stock Exchange Owner Nears $2B Stake in Polymarket: WSJ
contentSnippet: The investment could help Polymarket return to the U.S. market, after it was shut off to U.S. users in 2022 following a settlement with the CFTC.

title: Crunch Lab’s decentralized AI network gains traction in research
contentSnippet: The decentralized AI network has already been used to achieve breakthroughs in cancer gene research and therapy by the Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard.

title: BNB Hits Record High Above $1,280 as Blockchain Activity Surges
contentSnippet: The BNB Chain reported a record 58 million monthly active addresses, overtaking Solana, with growth driven by the decentralized exchange Aster.

title: Ken Griffin Sounds Alarm as Gold Futures Tops $4,000 and Dollar Weakens
contentSnippet: Citadel CEO warns of asset inflation and “de-dollarization” as investors seek safety in gold, bitcoin, and other hard assets.

title: Dubai regulator cracks down on 19 unlicensed crypto operators
contentSnippet: Dubai’s crypto regulator sanctioned 19 companies for unlicensed operations and marketing violations, imposing fines of up to $163,000.

title: トレカ市場を変革？！TCGのNFT化（トークン化）とは？図解でわかりやすく
contentSnippet: ポケモンカードをはじめとするトレーディングカードのNFT化（トークン化）とは何か。仕組み・メリット・注意点を図解でわかりやすく解説。CourtyardやCollector Cryptの事例も紹介。

title: Solana’s $2.85B Revenue Rivals Palantir, Robinhood Amid Waning Memecoin Craze
contentSnippet: 21Shares’ Matt Mena says Solana’s $2.85B in annual revenue shows lasting strength across DeFi, trading and new app sectors even as memecoin mania has cooled.

title: James Wynn’s big wins (and losses): The truth about trading with leverage
contentSnippet: James Wynn’s high-leverage bets on Bitcoin and memecoins turned him into one of crypto’s most-watched traders, with both wins and wipeouts.

title: Morgan Stanley Recommends a 4% 'Opportunistic' Crypto Portfolio Allocation
contentSnippet: The GIC described cryptocurrency as "a speculative and increasingly popular asset class that many investors, nut not all, will seek to explore"

title: U.S. Bitcoin ETFs Log $1B Inflows Again, a Level That’s Marked Local Tops Six Times Before
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) is now its most profitable ETF for BlackRock, generating an estimated $244.5 million in annual revenue with nearly $100 billion in assets.

title: Uniswap, Aave Lead DeFi’s Fee Rebound to $600M as Buybacks Take Center Stage
contentSnippet: Protocols are trying to make token design matter again and are actively routing value back to holders.

title: Fasset wins Malaysia license for stablecoin-powered ‘Islamic digital bank’
contentSnippet: Fasset received Labuan FSA approval to offer Shariah-compliant banking services powered by stablecoins, targeting Asia and Africa’s underserved markets.

title: 「韓国個人投資家の9000億円がイーサリアム・トレジャリー企業に集中」　サムソン・モウが警鐘鳴らす
contentSnippet: サムソン・モウ氏は、韓国の個人投資家による約9000億円がイーサリアムの価格を押し上げていると指摘し、イーサリアムおよびイーサリアム・トレジャリー企業に対する投資リスクを警告した。

title: Infinex bets on passkeys to access 100 crypto DApps — but is it safe?
contentSnippet: Using your thumbprint and phone to log in to crypto sites and approve transactions is very convenient — but how does its security compare to a hardware wallet?

title: Can Solana outperform Ether if ETFs get approved?
contentSnippet: How a US SOL ETF could shift access, flows and usage — plus the key metrics to watch to see whether Solana outperforms Ether.

title: なぜアフリカは仮想通貨普及で世界をリードし得るのか？金融イノベーションの最前線をレポート
contentSnippet: アフリカの仮想通貨採用が急拡大している。ビットコインやステーブルコイン(USDT/USDC)がケニア、ナイジェリア、ガーナで浸透。M-Pesa連携、送金コスト削減、インフレ対策の実例と、EUのMiCA規制から学ぶアフリカの金融イノベーションの未来を探る。

title: Top MIT Researcher Shows Decentralization Could Speed Up Ethereum, Solana
contentSnippet: MIT’s Médard says decentralization isn’t an ideology as large systems fail under central control, and new Ethereum tests prove it in code.

title: ソラナ・カンパニー、775億円相当SOL超を蓄積
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のソラナ・カンパニーが6日、デジタル資産トレジャリー戦略の一環としてソラナの継続的な取得を発表した。220万SOL超と1500万ドル以上の現金を保有。

title: India to Roll Out RBI-Linked Digital Currency Amid Dismissal of Crypto With 'No Backing'
contentSnippet: Experts say India is replacing its "tax-and-tolerate" stance with stricter oversight, favoring state-guaranteed digital currency.

title: FIFAのトークン化チケット購入権RTB、スイス当局が賭博の疑いを調査
contentSnippet: スイスの賭博規制当局が、国際サッカー連盟公式の2026年W杯チケット購入権トークンを調査している。賭博に該当する可能性を検討中だ。

title: VanEck Sees Bitcoin Reaching Half of Gold’s Market Value—But When?
contentSnippet: VanEck forecasts Bitcoin could capture half of gold’s $26 trillion market cap, though analysts say such valuations could take years.

title: シタデルのケン・グリフィンCEO、金とビットコインへの資金流入に懸念を表明
contentSnippet: ブルームバーグが10月7日に報じたところによると、シタデルのケン・グリフィン氏が投資家がドルより金を安全資産と見なし始めている状況に懸念を示した。デベースメント・トレードと呼ばれる金、銀、ビットコインへの投資拡大に言及。

title: 「年末にかけて金・仮想通貨・テック株を保有」著名投資家チューダー・ジョーンズ氏、リスクも指摘
contentSnippet: 著名投資家ポール・チューダー・ジョーンズ氏は、現在の株式市場における強気相場にはまだ大幅な上値余地があるとの見方を示した。年末にかけて金、仮想通貨、テック株を組み合わせて保有すると説明している。

title: Plume Network、SECにトランスファー・エージェント登録　価格20%以上高騰
contentSnippet: RWA特化のPlume Networkが米証券取引委員会からトランスファー・エージェント資格を取得した。米国証券市場のオンチェーン化を進めるとしている。

title: HumanoidExo Turns Human Motion Into Data That Teaches Robots to Walk
contentSnippet: The new system uses a wearable exoskeleton to record human motion and teach humanoid robots complex, full-body skills.

title: イーサリアムのM2相関性ラグ解消で価格1万ドル到達の可能性＝アナリスト分析
contentSnippet: Cryptoquantのアナリストは米M2マネーサプライの拡大とイーサリアムの流動性ラグについて分析し取引所在庫の減少と機関投資家の買い需要増加を背景にETH価格がこのサイクルで1万ドルに到達する可能性があると大胆予測。

title: メタプラネット、ビットコイン含み益が810億円に到達
contentSnippet: 10月7日の報道によると、世界第4位のビットコイン保有企業メタプラネットの含み益が5億4000万ドル（約810億円）に達し過去最高を記録。PHASE II戦略による今後の展開が注目される。

title: Eliza Labs Founder on Why AI Agents Shouldn’t Manage Your Money—Yet
contentSnippet: Walters said AI agents aren’t ready to manage money, arguing their current value lies in structuring market data and executing faster trades.

title: Bitcoin Mining Stocks Jump as Crypto Market Continues Historic Rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin mining company stocks are soaring as the price of the leading cryptocurrency breaks new all-time highs.

title: MetaMask Reveals $30 Million Rewards Program Ahead of Token Drop
contentSnippet: Prominent Ethereum wallet MetaMask is gearing up to debut its own token, and will roll out a Linea-fueled rewards program in the run-up.
